info: We’re proud to introduce Version 8.12.0 of our wallet, focusing on extending blockchain support and enhancing user experience. Here's what’s new:
bugs: Various Minor Bug Fixes: A range of minor bugs have been fixed to improve the overall user experience and ensure smoother operation of the wallet.
features: Telestai Blockchain and TLS Asset Support: Full integration of the Telestai UTXO blockchain, including support for managing, sending, and receiving Telestai (TLS) assets.
General Improvements: Across-the-board refinements have been made to sharpen feature performance and ensure a secure, seamless wallet experience.
